AT.name: LOST REAVERS
AT.description: Free-to-Play Online-Koop-Actionspiel für bis zu vier Spieler. Schließe dich online mit vier Freunden zu einem Team zusammen, um schwierige Gegner zu Fall zu bringen und verschiedene Fallen und Schlösser zu deaktivieren, die zwischen euch und den Schätzen im Level liegen. Bring sie in Sicherheit und sichere dir deinen Anteil an der Beute!

AU.name: LOST REAVERS
AU.description: Free-to-play online co-op action game for up to four players. Team up with friends online to take down formidable enemies and deactivate various traps and locks to reach the treasure that lies deep in the stage. Succesfully return with it to receive your share of the spoils!

BG.name: LOST REAVERS
BG.description: Free-to-play online co-op action game for up to four players. Team up with friends online to take down formidable enemies and deactivate various traps and locks to reach the treasure that lies deep in the stage. Succesfully return with it to receive your share of the spoils!

BE.name: LOST REAVERS
BE.description: Un jeu d'action en coopération en ligne free-to-play pour un maximum de quatre joueurs. Faites équipe avec vos amis en ligne pour éliminer des ennemis dantesques et désactiver différents pièges et serrures afin d'accéder au trésor caché au cœur du niveau. Rentrez avec votre butin pour recevoir votre part !

ES.name: LOST REAVERS
ES.description: Juego de acción cooperativo en línea y gratuito para hasta cuatro jugadores. Forma un equipo en línea con tus amigos y podréis enfrentaros a enemigos formidables y desactivar trampas y cerraduras para conseguir el tesoro escondido. ¡Si regresáis con él, recibiréis vuestra parte del botín!

IT.name: LOST REAVERS
IT.description: Gioco d'azione free to play online fino a quattro giocatori. Forma una squadra con gli amici online per affrontare formidabili nemici e disattivate trappole e serrature, raggiungendo tesori nascosti nelle profondità del livello. Riportalo alla base per ricevere la tua parte del bottino!

NL.name: LOST REAVERS
NL.description: Gratis te spelen online coöp actiegame voor maximaal 4 spelers. Werk samen met je vrienden online om angstaanjagende vijanden te verslaan en allerlei valstrikken en sloten onschadelijk te maken om bij de schat te komen die diep in de stage verborgen ligt. Bemachtig deze schat, breng hem terug en deel mee in de buit!

NZ.name: LOST REAVERS
NZ.description: Free-to-play online co-op action game for up to four players. Team up with friends online to take down formidable enemies and deactivate various traps and locks to reach the treasure that lies deep in the stage. Succesfully return with it to receive your share of the spoils!

PL.description: Free-to-play online co-op action game for up to four players. Team up with friends online to take down formidable enemies and deactivate various traps and locks to reach the treasure that lies deep in the stage. Succesfully return with it to receive your share of the spoils!

PT.name: LOST REAVERS
PT.description: Jogo de ação cooperativa online grátis para jogar com suporte para quatro jogadores. Junta-te aos teus amigos online para derrotar inimigos formidáveis e desativar várias armadilhas e fechaduras e alcançar o tesouro que reside no final do nível. Recupera o tesouro com sucesso e recebe a tua parte dos espólios!

RU.name: LOST REAVERS
RU.description: Бесплатная сетевая игра в жанре экшен с возможностью играть группой до 4 игроков. Объединившись с друзьями в команду, побеждайте грозных врагов, отключайте ловушки и открывайте замки, чтобы добраться до сокровища в конце этапа. Возвращайтесь вместе с ним и получите свою долю добычи!
